title: Broken Eggs with Zibas Classic Chips
instructions: Step 1. Heat the oil in a skillet over high heat and drop in the eggs.
Step 2. Reduce the heat to medium and cover.
Step 3. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 4. Cook until the yolk reaches the desired doneness, then remove from the skillet.
Step 5. Place on a plate and serve topped with Zibas.
